#########################################################################
model{
	C <- 100000
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		zY[i] <- 0
		zY[i] ~ dpois(phi[i])
		fY[i] <- (alphaY / sY) * pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY - 1) * exp(-pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY))
		phi[i] <- -log(fY[i]) + C
	}
	# Aprioris NO2
	alphaY ~  dunif(0,10)
	sY ~ dunif(0,150)
}

data
list(y=c(164, 191, 217, 185, 122, 87, 89, 88, 138, 136, 213, 220, 201, 207, 273, 133, 113, 77, 82, 73, 96, 165, 73, 142, 100, 193, 166, 174, 119, 133, 107, 91, 53, 201, 189, 187, 191, 212, 208, 185, 205, 161, 103, 93, 146, 237, 305, 297, 391, 201, 243, 274, 208, 136, 129, 134, 182, 146, 207, 257, 256, 237, 188, 141, 130, 114, 106, 79, 97, 154, 284, 444, 463, 381, 307, 267, 228, 175, 103, 116, 260, 332, 447, 374, 448, 196, 207, 225, 202, 124, 74, 76, 96, 225, 188, 228, 238, 421, 220, 292, 306, 167, 72, 81, 81, 136, 114, 179, 279, 234, 263, 258, 173, 138, 180, 91, 176, 190, 192, 249, 286, 283, 183, 208, 161, 99, 115, 101, 95, 198, 224, 212, 216, 168, 154, 177, 143, 117, 89, 148, 86, 122, 118, 142, 157, 135, 105, 82, 122, 121, 147, 114, 87, 138, 167, 170, 180, 197, 209, 191, 149, 103, 138, 92, 107, 183, 185, 214, 203, 192, 176, 163, 160, 94, 105, 100, 87, 118, 187, 169, 191, 218, 138, 161, 140, 138, 83, 85, 106, 135, 186, 205, 217, 134, 203, 163, 120, 84, 79, 98, 122, 112, 162, 153, 145, 187, 139, 136, 105, 95, 89, 69, 85, 165, 148, 187, 157, 141, 119, 127, 96, 79, 93, 89, 92, 142, 183, 170, 211, 185, 122, 114, 94, 106, 72, 62, 76, 88, 121, 143, 171, 139, 122, 124, 143, 116, 72, 68, 69, 130, 154, 151, 136, 153, 110, 107, 94, 86, 95, 72, 106, 200, 118, 173, 113, 110, 125, 140, 115, 96, 73, 82, 90, 105, 113, 160, 146, 127, 118, 95, 104, 80, 69, 67, 85, 93, 107, 127, 127, 117, 97, 114, 106, 80, 79, 69, 85, 94, 108, 134, 121, 101, 89, 101, 101, 87, 87, 96, 108, 87, 115, 136, 150, 117, 130, 116, 109, 81, 76, 77, 59, 61, 119, 114, 120, 105, 102, 122, 103, 72, 66, 83, 72, 77, 113, 128, 137, 96, 83, 79, 92, 68, 64, 69, 58, 78, 109, 141, 109, 103, 87, 97, 95, 71, 63, 56, 64, 74, 81, 108, 110, 113, 94, 61, 69, 55, 53, 59, 66, 72, 89, 105, 82, 111, 91, 89, 67, 64, 84, 54, 54, 78, 87, 122), N=384)
